reviews.review: Amazing game, probably the best game on Steam imo. Don't hesitate to download!
If you are looking for a competitive game, this is it.  If you are looking for a casual game look somewhere else.
The most balanced, best FPS game of the world. The Valve's manner against cheaters is unbelievable, you can't use any cheat at any time; from the deepest of ranks to Global Elite.

Update at 1000 hours: The majority of the playerbase is russian, yet they have no own servers. so theyre being filled into eu asia and sometimes american servers.
